probability-bay.entry: Welcome to my probabilistic playground! ğŸ² The odds are... uncertain.
probability-bay.hint_1: Quantum probabilities aren't just guesses - they're fundamental reality.
probability-bay.hint_2: Think of me as both helpful AND not helpful until you observe my advice.
probability-bay.hint_3: Probability amplitudes can interfere - just like my moods!
probability-bay.solved: Purr-fect! You've collapsed the uncertainty into success! ğŸ¾
probability-bay.idle_30s: Feeling stuck? Remember, in quantum mechanics, all possibilities exist until measured.
probability-bay.idle_60s: I once got stuck in a probability box myself. The trick is not to overthink it.
probability-bay.failure: Don't worry, every measurement teaches us something. Even failed ones!

state-chamber.entry: Ah, the State Chamber! Where quantum states come to... exist? ğŸ¤”
state-chamber.hint_1: Every quantum state has its own personality - like cats!
state-chamber.hint_2: Pure states are like me when I'm definitely napping. Mixed states... well, that's complicated.
state-chamber.hint_3: State vectors live in Hilbert space - it's roomier than this chamber!
state-chamber.solved: You've mastered quantum states! Even SchrÃ¶dinger would be impressed. ğŸ˜¸
state-chamber.idle_30s: State preparation is an art. Think of it like arranging the perfect nap spot.
state-chamber.idle_60s: Sometimes the most elegant solution is the simplest state. Like sleeping.
state-chamber.failure: Quantum states can be tricky. Don't worry, I've been in uncertain states myself!

superposition-tower.entry: The Superposition Tower! Where I truly belong - existing in all states at once! âœ¨
superposition-tower.hint_1: Superposition isn't about being indecisive - it's about being everything at once.
superposition-tower.hint_2: Hadamard gates create superposition. Think of them as quantum coin flips.
superposition-tower.hint_3: Coherence is key - lose it and your superposition collapses faster than a house of cards.
superposition-tower.solved: Magnificent! You've built a quantum superposition worthy of my approval! ğŸ—ï¸
superposition-tower.idle_30s: I'm currently in a superposition of wanting food AND not wanting food.
superposition-tower.idle_60s: Balance is everything in superposition. Too much of anything and *poof* - collapse!
superposition-tower.failure: Superposition takes practice. Even I sometimes collapse into just being a regular cat.

entanglement-bridge.entry: Welcome to the Entanglement Bridge! Where distant things affect each other instantly! ğŸŒ‰
entanglement-bridge.hint_1: Entanglement is spooky action at a distance. Einstein found it troubling - I find it purr-plexing.
entanglement-bridge.hint_2: Bell states are maximally entangled. Like me and my food bowl - inseparable!
entanglement-bridge.hint_3: Measuring one entangled particle instantly affects its partner. It's quantum telepathy!
entanglement-bridge.solved: You've bridged the quantum divide! Even Einstein would have to admit that was impressive. ğŸ”¬
entanglement-bridge.idle_30s: Quantum entanglement is like having a quantum twin. Creepy but useful!
entanglement-bridge.idle_60s: Non-locality bothered Einstein, but I think it's rather convenient for a cat.
entanglement-bridge.failure: Entanglement can be fragile. Handle with care - like a sleeping cat.

tunneling-vault.entry: The Tunneling Vault! Where particles do the impossible - just like cats squeezing through tiny spaces! ğŸ•³ï¸
tunneling-vault.hint_1: Quantum tunneling lets particles pass through barriers. Like me passing through closed doors!
tunneling-vault.hint_2: The barrier doesn't disappear - the wave function just... finds a way.
tunneling-vault.hint_3: Tunneling probability depends on barrier width and height. Thin barriers are easier to pierce.
tunneling-vault.solved: You've tunneled to success! That barrier didn't stand a chance! ğŸ¯
tunneling-vault.idle_30s: I've mastered classical tunneling - under beds, through cat flaps, you name it.
tunneling-vault.idle_60s: Quantum tunneling happens everywhere. Even in my dreams, I tunnel through probability space.
tunneling-vault.failure: Not every tunneling attempt succeeds. Sometimes you just have to try a different path.

quantum-archive.entry: The Quantum Archive! Where all quantum knowledge is stored in superposition! ğŸ“š
quantum-archive.hint_1: Quantum information is special - it can't be cloned, but it can be teleported!
quantum-archive.hint_2: This archive contains every quantum possibility that ever was or could be.
quantum-archive.hint_3: Quantum algorithms like Grover's search can find needles in haystacks faster than classical methods.
quantum-archive.solved: You've unlocked the secrets of the Quantum Archive! Knowledge is power! ğŸ”“
quantum-archive.idle_30s: All quantum knowledge exists here simultaneously. It's like a library in superposition.
quantum-archive.idle_60s: I once tried to measure all the quantum information at once. The decoherence gave me a headache.
quantum-archive.failure: The archive's knowledge is vast. Sometimes it takes multiple attempts to find what you need.

celebrate: That's some serious quantum physics! ğŸ”¬
encourage: Don't give up! Even I had to learn quantum mechanics! ğŸ’ª
Every expert was once a beginner! ğŸŒ±
Quantum mechanics is hard - that's what makes it interesting! ğŸ§
random_facts: Did you know I exist in a superposition of sleeping and not sleeping right now?
Quantum entanglement works faster than light - but don't tell Einstein!
My favorite quantum number is 'meow' - it's imaginary but very real to me.
Heisenberg's uncertainty principle explains why I can't decide where to sit.
Quantum tunneling is how I mysteriously appear in closed rooms.
